name: Vine Vengeance 5000
description:
Made in a weekend for Slavic Game Jam 2019.

You'll need a buddy, two (XBox?) controllers, and probably a 16:9 aspect ratio.

Featuring lovely music by Narek Papoyan.

Uses some stuff from https://game-icons.net/, https://freesound.org/ as well as wonderful people from the jam. I'll try to credit everything and everyone properly after the jam, please don't sue me.
